rumors: The Lich in the Shadowfall Tomb was once a hero of the Silver Wing.
A hidden passage exists behind the hearth in the Broken Barrel Tavern.
The swamp mists reflect your worst fears, turning them into phantoms.
The Iron Crown was stolen by a crow and taken to the Great Nest.
Drinking from the Blue Spring grants temporary foresight.

factions.The Silver Wing: Once-noble knights, now scattered and desperate.
factions.The Void Chorus: Cultists seeking to unravel the tapestry of reality.
factions.The Merchant's Guild: Greedy but essential for the survival of the borderlands.
factions.The Wild-Kin: A loose alliance of beast-folk protecting the deep woods.

recent_events: The Great Eclipse lasted three days, darkening the hearts of men.
The walls of the Manor began to bleed after the last ritual.
A shipment of 'Star-Glass' went missing near the Sunken Oasis.
The King has not been seen for a year, replaced by a silent regent.
